title: Anagram Detector (Hard)
description: Write a function `is_anagram` that checks if two given strings are anagrams of each other. Write a function `is_anagram` that checks if two given strings are anagrams of each other.   - `s1`, `s2` (str): Two strings that may contain only lowercase letters and no spaces.  - Returns `True` if the two input strings are anagrams of each other, `False` otherwise.
